html:
O Lord our God, other lords beside thee have had dominion over us. "Two views are held regarding the term other lords. One is that they were foreign rulers who, at various times beginning with the period of the judges, had held sway over Israel…. The second view is that the prophet is referring to the idol-gods which the people had served repeatedly throughout their history (cf. Isa. 2:8; Kgs. 18:4-6;] Amos 5:25-26)."

by thee only will we make mention of thy name. We have a responsibility to bear record of the name of the Lord to the world, and the Spirit and power accompany his name only.
